meanings.sent1: She seemed happy when she smiled.
meanings.sent2: It seemed like a good idea at the time.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be plotting something mischievous.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to dance in the air, full of life.
meanings.sent5: The stars seemed to twinkle in the dark night sky.

meanings.sent1: The movie seemed interesting from the trailer.
meanings.sent2: It seemed as though the storm would pass soon.
meanings.sent3: The cake seemed to be calling my name from the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to light up the room.
meanings.sent5: The flowers seemed to bloom overnight in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The clouds seemed fluffy and white in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The old house seemed haunted in the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream seemed to melt faster in the sun.
meanings.sent4: His eyes seemed to sparkle with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The mountain seemed to touch the sky with its peak.
